content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound in lombard, il when i noticed a white-yellow "foggy fireball" like object. it was traveling northbound as well but then just stopped and hovered. it disappeared into thin air after hovering for a few moments. i kept an eye out to make sure it wasn't an airplane but there was no airplane in sight. after driving a few more minutes northbound i noticed a really bright close "star" like object hovering which also disappeared into thin air.
content.summary: White fireball-like object

content.detailedDescription:
Delta shaped craft seen going from south to north in a straight line. white light in front, white light on both left and right side steady, no blinking. red center blinking light. deep roaring sound made. did not sound like jet noise. 

   clear skies, 2045 hours. estimated altitude 2000 feet, moving at steady speed. craft appeared to be very large. 

   lights illuminated craft so that the triangle shape of craft could be seen.
content.summary: Triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at my dads house and looked up to see 2reddish orange orbs in the sky moving from west to east then 2 more went by then 2more i yelled for my brother and he saw them we looked to the west and there were like a hundred of them coming 2 by 2 in a line they just kept coming my brother went to get my son so he could see this  and its like right across the street from us they all headed and would hover then fade into a little dot then nothing  we have a big farm across the street from us and i swear they must be in the field feels like we just got invaded there were so many of them
content.summary: We saw reddish orange orbs moving in pairs across the sky west to east at a certain point they hovered and faded out

content.detailedDescription: Came out to  pull the trash bins in at around 6:40 pm 2/4/16, i looked north,east at the catalina mts and saw a white orb skipping across the mountain top, the orbs movement almost seamed like it was lagging a bit and moving really eratic like. the orb moved along the top of the mountain range heading north west before decending on the other side {northside} of the mountain range. i tried to take a photo or a video but it was too dark for my phone to pick up.
content.summary: Orb skipping across the top of mt lemmon

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on leeville pike going towards nashville. when i got to an area that is being cleared off because houses are going in, so there are no trees there to obstruct my view. i saw the brightest white light i have ever seen. it was white not yellow white like a halogen light and it wasn't a bluish white like a l.E.D light it was white white. it was approximately 35Â° above the horizon about 1 mile away. at first i thought it was a plane or a helicopter because they have landing lights in the front but as it crossed my path the lights should have disappeared because the angle would have changed but the light was constant from the front, side and back. the object traveled approximately 3 miles in about 15 seconds.
content.summary: I saw a bright white light to my left and it flew across my path to my left at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from sterling, co to eckley, co, traveling south on the evening of 9/27/15.  i am not sure of the time but it was dark out.  i noticed a low glowing spherical object to the east of me.  it was too low to be a star or planet.  it appeared to be following me.  it would appear to be closer then farther away.  i tried to take a picture with my cell phone when it was the closest but my cell phone was dead. i traveled over 50 miles to my home and it was still there to the east, though smaller and farther away, so i took a picture with my cannon camera.  there was a full moon out later that night as well, full moon before the eclipse blood moon and i took some pictures of the moon as well.  the spherical glowing object was gone when i took pictures of the full moon. 
later when i zoomed in on the glowing object in my photo the perimeter appears odd and seems to emit some distance from the perimeter. there is nothing but white light in the center.
content.summary: Driving home from sterling, co i noticed a low bright glowing object that appeared to be following me home.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 7a.M. my wife happened to look out the bedroom window of our house.She then woke me up to see the strange object.It looked like a giant shiny silver ball to me.The object stayed motionless for a few moments then six smaller balls similar in color came out of the bottom of the large object.The six small objects flew in all different directions while the large object stayed still.Soon after the six small objects returned,lining up 3 on the bottom right and 3 0n the bottom left side of the large object.It looked like the bottom of the large object opened up and the small objects entered alternately one on the right then one on the left until they were all in.Then the large object imedietley took off at a right angle and was out of sight within a second or so.During the sighting i was amazed at what i was seeing.After the sighting i wanted to tell some of my family and friends about the incidence.I thought about reporting the incedent but the next day the  newspaper said it was a weather balloon.Aperantly some other people had seen what i and my wife did.I told a few of my friends and family about the sighting but no one believed i saw a ufo.I was approx.24 at the time of the sighting, i now am 66.A few years back my wife joined a site last year i started to use the site to talk to old friends  .About a month ago or so i asked if anyone had seen a ufo back in the 70s.To my amazement 5 or six people had seen what i had seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I observed a silver sphere hovering it ejected six smaller spheres they flew around in different directions then returned lining up 3 on each side of large sphere then they went into sphere 1 at a time

content.detailedDescription: upper middle class neighborhood, university park, single family homes, i went out on my patio on a lovely starlit, quiet autumn nite to have a smoke, sat in patio chair, lit cigarette, relaxed, then movement, straight out from my position, from a red-orange orb, size of a basketball, at about 8' off the ground in my neighbors driveway, about 100' away, caught my eye. i sat observing, at first thinking 'what in the world', as it slowly ascended, it would disappear when it would have a part of the large oak tree obstruct it's view to me, then reappear as it continued to slowly rise. several times i'd lose sight of it, behind tree limb, then it would reappear higher on same 'floating' trajectory, upwards, then approx 100' up i lost sight of it. what did i just observe? and why? i got up, looked around, no-one to be seen or heard, went back to my world inside the house.
content.summary: First observed red-orange orb 75' away slowly rise from 8' up to 100' in neighbor's drway thru tree from my patio

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on 87 towards i10, when a very fast black object flew from right to left, exactly in front of my car. i slammed the breaks and came to a complete stop. so did the driver behind me. as i looked to my right i saw a very shiny object flying erratically then disappeared without any sound, i just felt a very strong gust of wind. and, it left a circle-like trace in the  sky. i photographed it from that point. later, as i was driving on i10 towards san antonio, i looked right and the saw that the "circle" was still in the sky... it was about 30 min later, so it was quite surprising that it did not dissipate by then. 

the occurrence happened at the exact same place i saw (and reported it) about 50 creatures that had a very weird skin, a light purple, see-through, with very dark veins throughout... they were walking on their hands and knees, trying to create the impression they were sheep... 

this happened in november 2015, when it is too cold to shear the sheep.(when i tried to report the incident to the local authorities, they claimed all i saw was freshly sheared sheep. i grew up on a farm. i know how the ey look like. those were not sheep!) a week later, police put cones in the area: "cattle", they claimed... yeah, right! something odd is happening in the area. huge installations are brought into town almost every day. it is unusual to see all those huge devises been hauled right through downtown fredericksburg!

the first 2 pix are from 87, the second 2 are from i10
content.summary: Strange circle in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Ok so we, my wife her aunt and her aunt's boyfriend and my daughter and myself,  all went out to my sisters house in aledo, tx on saturday night.  aledo is about five or six miles to the west of ft. worth and a couple miles south of i-20.  aledo is a small town and it's out in the country way away from city lights.  it was a crystal clear night, not one cloud in the sky...Beautiful night.  we could see all the stars and lots of constellations.  i even saw a couple shooting stars.  we go in my sisters backyard with my brother-in-law and we laid down on the ground and just stared at the sky.  my brother-in-law has been telling about these ufo's for several months, he said these have been going on since last summer almost on a nightly basis.  so we all laid down and started looking and sure as anything we saw what he and my sister had been describing.  these ufo's look just like stars....They just look like white dots in the sky.  but right before they would start moving they would get really bright, at least as bright as the brightest star in the sky.  then it would move.  now, these things didn't just shoot across the sky but they moved what looked to be just inches across the sky.  this is kind of difficult to describe due to the distance these things were but they would move what appeared to be inches across the sky.  but the time that it took for them to move and the distance that they seemed to move indicated to me that these things were moving at incredibly high rates of speed.  its kind of like when you are driving down the highway and you are going 90 mph...Things way out in the distance to your side seem to be moving really slow but in reality you are moving quickly.  it was an illusion of speed kind of like that.  these lights would get really bright and then start moving.  sometimes they would go in straight lines and then stop and just stay in the same spot.  sometimes they would move in zigzag patterns, sometimes they would be going in a straight line and then make a ninety-degree turn on the drop of a dime.  then sometimes they would also go in straight lines and then make circles!  i know what i saw and what i saw was not of this world.  there were four or five of these things.  i don't know of anything else in this world that could move the way these objects moved and stop and turn the way these objects turned.  i am of one of two opinions on what these things could have been.  one:  the government has finally been able to reverse engineer the alien technology that has been in their possession from all the ufo crashes that have happened here.  they have finally been able to reverse engineer it, harness it and use it.  two:  these are ufo's.  crafts and beings not of this world.  i believe that what we had all seen was indeed ufo in origin.  and just for the record no one was drinking or under the influence of any drugs.  we were all stone cold sober.  thank you for taking the time to read my witness account.  anyone who is reading this and lives out in the area just look up at the sky and be still and patient.  you will see these things.  i couldn't get any picture or video of these because it was just way to dark and they were just way to far away.  i did have another incredible ufo encounter when i was a teenager but that is for another time.
content.summary: Star-like lights and shapes would move and then stop.  change direction mid-flight and then stop.

content.detailedDescription:
In the afternoon taking a short nap with boyfriend i saw a white orb hover near my  window blinds and numerous voice started to taunt me, about ,in frank ridiculous stuff - the things in my fridgerator, my tampons and pads,m the sex i had last night.  they also seemed extremely  obsessed with my tv. i wont say they had me fully under their power but every time i thoughtabout getting up i felt extremely weak.  i saw3 them reach through the window with something black and my phone beeped twice  i then started hearing my roommate ( who is a prostitute ) "talking to me about getting up and eating in a very strange warbly voice. this went on for hours then my boyfriend woke up am they dissapea4red. 

about 15 minuts later i started running blood bet3ween my legs and passed out. i went to the er and was ruched into the back where they decided to do a d/c on me ( i had a baby a month ago) on the way there i though i crossed over i felt my life slipping away from but i did make it thourhg.

i am pretty sure this is punishment for getting pregnant while abducted as it was told to me that they forbid you to get pregnant to cover their guilt.

if they return to my house i will be filing a report on this site every time it happens. i'm a normal person with good family. and friends

i hope you can get them a message in some way to move on to another sight to prey on.

alsoi there is a black shape appearing on my wall in this shape l
content.summary: While orb with obvious portal patterna and several small bars

content.detailedDescription: Summer afternoon. black object very high in sky. inlike a weather baloon or anything ive ever seen . was moving higher and west. i was very surprised and couldnt think of any rational explanation. i called my dad out to check i wasnt seeing things and he saw it too. the stragest thing about it was it looked as if someone had just coloured in sky and the black spot was moving around randomly it was black like a shadow not a incredibly dark shade. looked simular to what a spot in vision would look like. it finally disappeared from vision when it got to high up to see.
content.summary: Black object very high and odd shape looked a little like spot in vision . had a tail very high up

content.detailedDescription: Pulsing light
content.summary: Light in the sky

2. when i looked at the picture i took i noticed an object in my picture.

content.detailedDescription:
South australia endfield seen lights earlier in night in sky around 10 pm they were moving bery fast then they vanished then i was out the back around an hour later seen the same thing again in my back yard.
but then i thoguht it would be a good idea to get my light with sos at the lights big mistake i can say that mcu lights started reacting to what i had done repeated same signal back i coulod not belive what i seen to then they vanish again.
around 2 in the moarning i hear i big noise out the back of house i went out the re somthing had knocked over all thje cans and bottles in a bag outside i then proceeded to go to toilet outside haha i know.
then nothing again outsid ethis time enity in backyard corner near tree i seen its eyes but i thought nothing of it because thought it was a possum but no it was around 5 ft tall and dark with a weird face i called the police they laughed so thayts were im at i lcoked all the doors and sat their with a bat for the whole night thats it what ios going to happen tonight sorry for the bad spelling.
content.summary: Alien not humane

content.detailedDescription: While looking out my sliding door window in same area i've seen other ufo's-saw stationary strobe like very very bright white hovering in the dark sky northeast over ocean stationary for at least 8-10 minutes there were also 2 moving objects darker in color nearby as if they were checking the object out or where with the larger object, and my son saw it also said it didn't look like a plane it was suspicious nothing like it every seen in sky.  in the vacinity of nuclear plant nearby in same area. white sparkling bright light coming from object. have seen orbs glowing following planes going in and out of the chem trails in the same area vacinity. lots of activity in this particular area.
content.summary: Strobe like mostly white lights red gold different colors flashing back large round/disc shape ufo stationary hovering

content.detailedDescription: Me and my roommate went out on the porch of our second floor apartment to smoke a cigarette. my roommate asked "is that a plane". we live near an airport so it's not uncommon though we both knew it wasn't a plane. but i also knew that the planets were extra bright tonight so i thought it must be mars or jupiter as i looked. it's was a very bright reddish orange color that seemed to make sense that it was a planet the my roommate and i saw a plane fly nearby and noticed just how bright the light in the sky was. i started to reach for my phone to pull out google skymap to check. my roommate stated that it was moving and in the time it took for her to look from it to me and back it was gone. as an empirist this experience is very troubling as i didn't get more documentation. but knowing that fact that someone else i trust saw the same thing with me gives me some comfort. again i live near dfw airport and carswell (could be wrong name) naval reserve base so i'm not discounting that it may have been a government test craft but it wasn't a star plane or helicopter or planet or any aerocraft i have ever seen.
content.summary: Planet-like shape in the sky just vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting watching tv and i was alone in the house.  suddenly i saw something moving in my left side at about 12" of distance.  it capture my attention but he moves so quickly that i just can saw it moving so fast. he/she was like hiding from me because it noticed i saw it.

days before (jan 20 approximately) i was in the living room and i can see from my living room my bedroom (around 10-11" approximately). the same situation occurred, this little guy was looking at me and i didn't noticed, once i saw him/her it moves so fast that i just saw the reflect of him. that night i was the only person in the living room. my son was in his bedroom.

i did not heard any sound, i did not felt afraid.  i know he was looking at me in both events like trying to captivate my attention momentarily.
content.summary: A being about 4 feet hiding when i looked at him/her

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 3-4 in the morning. i was sleeping and all the sudden something woke me up. when i opened my eyes i saw a tall man walking back and forth in front of my bed.  he was really tall about more than 7'-8'. i can hardly see his face, i just saw the figure. it is good to know that my bedroom door was half opened and a light comes from the living room. that is why i saw the silhouette and not his face.

i sit on the bed and check my husband to see if it was him (my husband is not too tall) but first i saw something moving so fast from side to side. it was not my husband, when i looked back that being was not there.  then i go back to sleep again but as soon as i put my head on the pillow i saw the being again. he was moving in the same way as before. i tried to see his face but i couldn't.  then i started feeling like a lethargy as hard that i can't handled it and got sleep.

i did not feel any fear, i am just concerned why he was moving back and forth like he wanted something to happen.  he was like desperate.
content.summary: It was a human like entity but so tall.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? driving east on holt road.
2. what made you first notice the object? two bright white lights on the front of the craft.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? possibility a private plane.
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.Craft was about 20-30 feet above the treeline and moving very slowly. as it crossed holt road, it went over the top of my car. i had the windows down listening for an engine and heard nothing. 
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.I started looking for a place that i could pull off the road to get a better look, and try pictures. however due to traffic, i was unable to pull of the road.  
6. how did you lose sight of the object? moved out of my sight from the trees in the area. 

traveling east on holt road around 715 pm cst. i was between  holt hills road and redmond lane as it pasted over my car. the lights on the front of the craft are very bright. and the altitude of the craft was extremely low for any conventional craft aside from maybe a helicopter. and the speed at which the craft was traveling would rule out a plane or a jet as they would most like stall. if this was a helicopter, it made no sound and the distance between the lights would make the helicopter very wide. not sure what it was, but this is why we post. looking for answers.
content.summary: Craft with triangular lighting flying sw to ne across holt road.

content.detailedDescription:
I spotted a ufo in april of 2014. i had 1 other eyewitness who saw it with me.
the time i saw the ufo was during the sunset at the green cay nature center in boynton beach, florida. i have been there many times and i know the wildlife there. that sighting has been the weirdest thing i have seen there and also the strangest thing i have seen in all of my life!

 i was taking a sunset photo and i saw a weird light in the sky so i started taking pictures of it. i was exited and amazed ! the ufo started out as a small line of fire in the sky. the fire in the sky got longer as time went on. then it faded away. you can see what i am talking about in the photos. i ask the staff in the nature center what they thought it was. they said that it was too close to be a rocket. i first thought it might be an angel in fire or a ufo.

i have enclosed my photos of the strange light in the sky for you to review. i would like you to identify it for me. i have also enclosed a copy of a photo i found in a ufo book from the library.  the book was entitled ufo the complete sightings by peter brookesmith. the picture looked a lot like mine.

i am a 16-year-old homeschool kid that loves to study ufos and cryptozoology. i love to photograph landscapes. i also love going to dog shows and photographing dogs. i am a very honest person. oh did i mention i am a huge star wars fan? the force awakens was awesome! may the force be with you!!
content.summary: Flaming trail object seen in florida

content.detailedDescription:
Was waiting outside my job.  a restaurant.  for my ride around 10pm. standing,  facing street when from behind me looked as if someone glued led or neon strobe lights to a baseball and threw it across the street above me.  just over the power lines is what it seemed.  but it never came out on the other side of the power lines,  had it been an actual ball id assume it would fall into the parking lot across the street,  or if it was a toy it would continue on in the direction it was headed,  but as fast as i could look up,  it was gone. it was silent and quick. 

imagine the silence and speed of a bat flying around at night.  it's comparable.  except for the lights and it clearly wasn't a bat. 

i live outside of nyc, i know it was around sept 11th because i was first looking at the memorial lights to my left,  aka east. it's never been a big deal enough for me to report since i already accept the idea that there are surely things out there we are not aware of yet and just thought it was cool i got to witness something 1st hand.  i had my boss check cameras but object was too high for parkinglot cam. 

reporting it now because i just watched "sirius" documentary and thought perhaps its best to document this for any similar sightings that have or may still occur.
content.summary: From behind me flew across street in instant was gone.  strobing neons,  size of baseball?

content.detailedDescription: We were on our drive home i saw a reflection like light in the sky of diamond shaped object in the sky and then we started to notice many more as we were getting home we only ended up seeing you and we lost sight of the rest of them inve they went east and the  but they were flashing orangee saw many more with them as we were getting home we only ended up seeing you and we lost sight of the rest of them inve they went east and the  but they were flashing orange i thought i'd never even seen this on youtube
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On our drive homework saw a letter of diamond shaped object in the sky and then we saw many more with them as we were getting home we only ended up seeing you and we lost sight of the rest of them inve they went east and the  but they were flashing orange

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1967 in the village of the power plant at manic 1 , on rue mccormick , a ufo landed in the back yard of an associate of my father , when my father learned of this he took me and my sister to see the yard as it had been learned that there was evidence of this.We arrived and walked into his backyard, the house was a 2 story duplex company home , lawn and shrubs well kept, the man who lived there and witnessed this was the supervisor at the hydro power plant facility at mccormick power station manic 1 , as we looked around , we could clearly see that something had taken place in his yard , their were 4 impressions in the ground  approximately 8'-10'  apart evenly spaced making a square, the ground is firm as quebec soil is very hard in the area  the impression was maybe 2"-3" deep and approximately 18" diameter., the grass in the center of the impression looked burned but not singed , heavier  the center and becoming lighter as it lead away from the center , but the entire yard felt (crispy) there was a large tree on the north east corner of the yard , maybe 10' feet from the north east impression , the entire face of the tree had all its leaves burnt like , brown and dried up curled in , but the back side of the tree was still green,the back of the house looked as though it might have been singed as well, these are memories as best as i can remember them my sister and my father also remember , the gentleman who lived there eventually renigged his story and said that he had done it as a hoax , ( we believe that he feared for his job ) and wanted to speak of it no more .   it was not a hoax , i have the gentlemans name , but i do not know if he is still alive .
content.summary: This is a report based on events not witnessed directly by me

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking garbage out the back door,  (to the north).
a number of bright orange lights caught my attention to the
north. i observed a number (maybe 5 to 10)of extremely bright
objets, floating to the north west. they gradually faded the farther west
they drifted. at times they seemed to arraigned themsevles into different geometric patterns.
i am familiar with different aircraft, and i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Bright orange lights (5-10) flying in sky
